===Overview===
The '''Frankish Empire''' or '''Kingdom of the Franks'''  was the largest post-Roman barbarian kingdom in Western [[Europe]]. It was ruled by the [[Franks]] during Late Antiquity and the Early Middle Ages. It would eventually split and evolve into the modern European nations of [[France]], [[Germany]], [[Switzerland]], [[Austria]], [[Belgium]], the [[Netherlands]], and [[Luxembourg]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #1}}

===Origin===
The Roman historian; [[Publius Cornelius Tacitus (Earth-616)|Tacitus]] told the tales at the beginning of the Christian era, the region of central Europe was inhabited by the bloodthirsty [[Franks]]. They was a tribe of men who worshipped [[Odin Borson (Earth-616)|Wode]], a [[God]] a frenzy and Berzerker rage. Any warrior slain in their tribe tribes fierce sacrificial joust was chosen to accompany a God on their demented Skyride known as The Wild Hunt.{{r|Doctor Strange, Sorcerer Supreme Vol 1 37}} 

===4th century===
The Romans employed Franks as mercenaries lead by [[Merovech (Earth-616)|Merovech]] in Gallia Belgica, who took control of the region.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Belgium]]'s entry}} The '''Merovingian''' dynasty lasted a few centuries, later replaced by the '''Carolingian''' dynasty.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Belgium]]'s entry}}
 
===5th century===
[[File:Franks from Doctor Strange, Sorcerer Supreme Vol 1 37 002.jpg|left|250px|thumb|"Fall of Rome"]]
After the fall of the [[Roman Empire]], those same Franks went on to conquer the land south of the Rhine and make it under their name, by the mountainous "Rock of the Franks", which is the meaning of the word "'''[[Frankenstein Family|Frankenstein]]'''" waited silently, is first of all blurred, Not yet sated. [[Castle Frankenstein]] would one day be built on that site cursing their line for centuries to come. {{r|Doctor Strange, Sorcerer Supreme Vol 1 37}}

In late 5th century, Frankish king [[Clovis I (Earth-616)|Clovis I]] had conquered much of the [[Gaul]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[France]]'s entry}}

===8th Century===
In the late 8th Century., [[Charlemagne (King) (Earth-616)|Emperor Charlemagne]], became King of the Franks.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1}}

In 800 A.D., Charlemagne, was crowned Roman emperor by Pope Leo III.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Germany]]'s entry}}

===9th Century===
Around 840 A.D., at Charlemagne's death, the Empire was split between three of his grandsons:{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Belgium]]'s entry}} '''Middle Francia''' ([[Belgium]]) was ruled by [[Lothair (Earth-616)|Lothair]],{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Belgium]]'s entry}} the east of the Empire became '''East Francia''' ([[Germany]]), ruled by [[Louis the German (Earth-616)|Louis the German]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Germany]]'s entry}} '''West Francia''' ([[France]],{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[France]]'s entry}}) was ruled by [[Charles the Bald (Earth-616)|Charles the Bald]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Belgium]]'s entry}}
